summary: Rama is a very important god in Hinduism, believed to be the seventh avatar (incarnation) of Vishnu. He is the main character in the ancient story, *Ramayana*, and is seen as the perfect human being. Rama was born a prince in Ayodhya and married Sita. His life had many challenges, like being exiled and fighting the demon king, Ravana, to rescue Sita. His story teaches people about right and wrong and their duties. Many Hindu festivals, like Rama Navami, celebrate his life. Rama is especially revered in Vaishnavism and has inspired many artistic performances and writings.
title: Rama
